pageContext.claim: “This week, in only 4 days, we had the biggest Stock Market increase since 1974. We have a great chance for the really big bounce when the Invisible Enemy is gone!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is cherry picking a four day stretch which isn't a uniform way to measure data. April 6 did have one of the largest single day jumps, gaining more than seven percent, but that is still less than what the market jumped at the end of March. Regardless, overall, the Dow Jones Industrial Average is still well below where it was in late January.
